# <a name="address-book-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="2376f-102">Outlook.com의 주소록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2376f-102">Address book in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2376f-103">Outlook.com 주소록을 사용자 라고 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2376f-103">Your Outlook.com address book is called People.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2376f-104">사용자 페이지로 이동 하려면 [](https://outlook.live.com/people/) **사용자** 를 선택 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2376f-104">To go to your [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/) page, select **People**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="2376f-105">페이지의 아래쪽 모서리에 있거나 페이지의 위쪽 모서리에 있는 앱 선택기에서 이동 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2376f-105">at the bottom corner of the page, or from the app selector at the top corner of the page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2376f-106">[Outlook.com에서 연락처를 만들고, 보고, 편집](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)하는 방법에 대해 알아봅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2376f-106">Learn how to [Create, view, and edit contacts in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
